data.name: Race Condition Demo
data.detailed_description:
Race Condition is a fast paced arcade style racing game. You compete against nine other cars in a frantic battle for the podium. Win medals to unlock new tracks around the globe. This game is all about the core racing experience and strives to put you into a zen-like state of flow as you speed around the tracks and become the first to cross the finish line.

This demo lets you play three tracks from the full game. The demo supports 1-4 simultaneous players in split screen mode.

data.short_description: Try out three exciting tracks from the upcoming racing game RACE CONDITION. Supports 1-4 players in split screen mode.
